title: Saint George for England, allegorically described: by Gerrard De Malynes merchant
author: Malynes, Gerard, fl. 1586-1641.
publisher: By Richard Field for William Tymme stationer, and are to be sold at the signe of the Floure de luce and Crowne in Pater-noster row,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
